Gestalt Anchor

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Kalashtar, ardent, Ardent Mantle class feature
Benefit: You and allies within the radius of your Ardent Mantle gain a +2 bonus to initiative checks.
    The first time you drop to 0 power points during an encounter, allies within the radius of your Ardent Mantle gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 131.
